title: Aiguille des Angroniettes
text: The Aiguille des Angroniettes is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Pennine%20Alps">Pennine Alps</a>, located on the border between <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a> and <a href="Italy">Italy</a>. It lies on the main Alpine watershed, west of the <a href="Grand%20Golliat">Grand Golliat</a>.
